body:
@bagder LTS I guess?. I cloned the master REPO yesterday. 

FYI: I also tried it with another version like 1 or 2 months ago, but I had not set my "LANG" var in WRKENVVAR correctly back then. Obviously not even a single module got installed then.

I tried with CURL/8.10.0 now. Sadly same result, can't install curl in the end. 
Makelog included. One without CCSID Override one with Override config (attached also with .txt ending because github)

issue.title: CZM0045(30) Undeclared identifier SSL_CB_MAX_SIZE when building without SSL support

repository.name: curl
repository.description: A command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax, supporting DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, GOPHERS, HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, LDAP, LDAPS, MQTT, POP3, POP3S, RTMP, RTMPS, RTSP, SCP, SFTP, SMB, SMBS, SMTP, SMTPS, TELNET, TFTP, WS and WSS. libcurl offers a myriad of powerful features

issue.body:
### I did this

Compile 8.10.1 source code without SSL support on IBM i V7R4M0

```
CZM1003:  http_negotiate.c, 113.51: CZM0045(30) Undeclared identifier SSL_CB_MAX_SIZE.
CZS0601:  Module HNEGOTIATE is not created because statement errors occurred.
```

https://github.com/curl/curl/pull/13098 added code to http_negotiate.c behind conditional HAVE_GSSAPI, however this block of code at line 113 references SSL_CB_MAX_SIZE which is only defined if USE_SSL is also defined.

The fix is to make the conditional check based on both HAVE_GSSAPI and USE_SSL. This looks like the problem reported in https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/14938

### I expected the following

Clean build

### curl/libcurl version

8.10.1

### operating system

OS400 V7R4M0

body: I think this is the same issue https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/14952
